mapper.select: SELECT ftfbf.FSYMBOL AS fund_code, --基金代码 ftfbf.FDSNAME AS fund_name, --基金名称 ftfbf.KEEPERNAME AS keeper_name, --管理人名称(基金公司名称) to_char(tci.COMPINTRO) AS company_desc FROM finchina.tq_fd_basicInfo@finchinadb ftfbf, --基金基本信息 finchina.TQ_COMP_INFO@FINCHINADB tci WHERE ftfbf.FSYMBOL = #{fund_code} AND ftfbf.KEEPERCODE = tci.COMPCODE
